name: JuniperSpares.com
tag_list: used-juniper, used-networking-hardware, network-hardware, technology, routers, switches, firewalls
overview:
JuniperSpares.com is THE Source for Used Juniper Networks Hardware. JuniperSpares.com is the leader in buying and selling Pre-owned, Refurbished, unused and used Juniper networking hardware (Juniper Routers, Juniper Switches, Juniper Firewalls). Our end user clients are saving up to 80% off of list price on their equipment purchases and getting our limited lifetime warranty at no extra charge.

Visit us at http://www.JuniperSpares.com and http://www.juniperspares.com/used-juniper.html

Our blog: http://JuniperSpares.blogspot.com

Some of our products include:

Used Juniper E Series Routers We carry all models from the Juniper ERX series to the Juniper E320 and Juniper E120 series and everything in between. Juniper ERX Line (LM) Modules, and Juniper E320 Line Cards.

Used Juniper J Series Routers We carry all models from the Juniper J2320, J2350, J4350, J6350 series.

Used Juniper M Series Routers We carry all models from the Juniper M-series multiservice edge routers including the following platforms: M7i, M10i, M40e, M120, and M320. PE-1GE-SX-B, PE-4FE-TX, PE-2MCDS3.

Used Juniper MX Series We carry all models from the Juniper MX-series including the following three Ethernet services routers: MX240, MX480, and MX960.

Used Juniper T Series We carry all models from the Juniper T-series routing platforms including: T320 Router, T640 Routing Node, T1600 Routing Node, and the TX Matrix Platform.

Used Juniper Secure Access SSL VPN Juniper Secure Access SSL VPN Appliances 2000, 2500, 4000, 4500, 6000, 6500 Appliances Base Systems & Accessories.

Used Juniper Firewalls Juniper Firewalls include: SSG 5, SSG 5 Wireless, SSG 20, SSG 20 Wireless, SSG 140, SSG 320M, SSG 350M, SSG 520M, SSG 550M, ISG 1000, ISG 2000, NetScreen 5200, and NetScreen-5400.

Used Juniper Unified Access Control (UAC) Juniper Networks Unified Access Control (UAC) & IC 4000, AC 4500, AC 6000, AC 6500.

Used Juniper Intrusion Prevention The Juniper IDP modules we carry include: NS-IDP 50, NS-IDP 200, NS-IDP 600C, NS-600F, NS-IDP 1100C, and NS-IDP1100F.

Juniper CTP Series Circuit to Packet The Juniper Circuit to Packet (CTP) series we carry includes the following models: CTP1002, CTP1004, CTP1012, CTP2008, CTP2024, CTP2056, AND CTPView.

Juniper WX & WXC Application Acceleration Platforms Juniper’s application acceleration platforms (WAN Compression Optimizers) WX 15, WS 20, WX 100, WX Stack, WXC 250, WXC 1800, WXC 2600, WXC 500, WXC 590, WXC 3400, WXC Stack.

JuniperSpares.com offers a Limited Lifetime Warranty on all used Juniper hardware that we sell. (End Users Only). If you are looking for used Juniper equipment at a huge savings with a fantastic warranty, let our experts give you a quote. Our engineers are Juniper Certified. We test every unit thoroughly to ensure our customer’s satisfaction. We then stand behind it with our lifetime warranty. Although we specialize in used Juniper, we also sell Cisco, Foundry, Extreme, F5, Nortel, HP and many other manufacturers of networking hardware.

JuniperSpares.com is THE Source for used networking hardware. We specialize in buying and selling used Juniper routers, switches, firewalls, wireless products, memory, cables and other network hardware to businesses of all sizes. We are not in any way affiliated with Juniper Systems Inc., or any other manufacturer. We sell only Pre-Owned network hardware and do not sell licensed software of any kind.
